document_data.mainbody:
he Mares Tail was a tavern of note in the capital city of Cormyr â€“ Suzale as of the mid to late 14 century DR.
The Mares Tail stood two blocks south from Suzails grand Promenade, on a street that crossed the Court Close that laid to the west from the establishment. Travelers who walked along the Court Close from the Promenade moving south needed to turn east once they passed Zhaeluns Stockyard. Then moving east past the stockyard and two next buildings, they reached the Mares Tail on the streets northern side. Across from it, to the south, stood Taneths Feasthall.
